board = biquskrpro_1.1; 

//LED blinks to indicate Platform is spinning or other diagnostic 
//Comment out or set to NoPin if not wanted.
leds.diagnostic = PA.7; 


heat.tempSensePins = {bedtemp, e0temp, e1temp}; //Max of 3 entries

	//ESP Settings
8266wifi.espDataReadyPin = PA.8;
8266wifi.TfrReadyPin = PG.4;
8266wifi.espResetPin = PF.12;
																																											//TMC Smart Drivers
stepper.numSmartDrivers = 6;

// External Display settings
serial.aux.rxTxPins = {PA.10, PA.9};
